articles.description: An Australian woman has revealed shocking footage of the hidden dirt lurking within the fabric of her car seats after undergoing a deep clean using a carpet cleaning appliance.
articles.content:
An Australian woman has revealed shocking footage of the hidden dirt lurking within her car seats after undergoing a deep clean using a carpet cleaning gadget.
